essentials.title: Essential cookies
essentials.description: Essential cookies help to make the website usable by allowing basic functions, navigating the page and using the protected areas of the site. The website will not work properly without these cookies and their consent is not required.

optionalServiceMap.title: Service Map
optionalServiceMap.text: The Service Map of the Helsinki Metropolitan Area helps users in finding an event on the map
optionalServiceMap.expandAriaLabel: Show cookie information related to the Service Map
optionalServiceMap.checkboxAriaDescription: Cookies are used to display the Service Map of the Helsinki Metropolitan Area

optionalMatomo.title: Matomo
optionalMatomo.text: Matomo Analytics software is being used to follow and improve the website to better attend to user's needs.
optionalMatomo.expandAriaLabel: Show cookie information related to the Matomo.

optionalAskem.title: Askem
optionalAskem.text: Askem enables quick feedback submission on the website.
optionalAskem.expandAriaLabel: Show cookie information related to the Askem.

cookies.app: Used by {{ appName }} to store information about whether visitors have given or declined the use of cookie categories used on the site.
cookies.matomo: A cookie of the Matomo statistics system.
cookies.matomo_cookie_consent: Records the visitorâ€™s consents to Matomo tracking.
cookies.askem: A record related to the operation of the Askem react buttons.
cookies.servicemap_analytics: A cookie of the Matomo statistics system for the Service Map.
cookies.servicemap_ga: A Google analytics cookie for the Service Map.
cookies.nextjs_scroll: Used by websites to remember a user's scroll position on a page, especially after they navigate back or forward. This provides a more seamless user experience by automatically scrolling to the correct location when the user returns to a previous page.

expiration.session: The session cookie is deleted once the user exits the page

askem.cookiesRequiredDescription: To use this feature, you must accept cookies from the site. You can provide feedback on this page by enabling statistics-related cookies.

hdsCookieConsent.heading: {{siteName}} uses cookies
hdsCookieConsent.description: This website uses required cookies to ensure the basic functionality and performance. In addition, we use targeting cookies to improve the user experience, perform analytics and display personalised content.
hdsCookieConsent.formHeading: About the cookies used on the website
hdsCookieConsent.formText: The cookies used on the website have been classified according to their intended use. Below, you can read about the various categories and accept or reject the use of cookies.
hdsCookieConsent.highlightedGroup: You need to accept this category to display the content you have selected.
hdsCookieConsent.acceptedAt: You have accepted this category: {{date}} at {{time}}.
